item.title: Second Post
item.description:
Second Post

This is my second post. In this post, I’ll demonstrate how easy it is to write content using Markdown with Hugo.

Markdown Syntax

You can use bold text, italic text, and inline code. You can also create lists:

  • Item 1
  • Item 2
  • Item 3

Or numbered lists:

  1. Step one
  2. Step two
  3. Step three
